DOC.brief_title: An Investigation Dose-dependent Vascualr Effects ( - ) -Epicatechin Healthy Men
DOC.criteria: Body Mass Index 2027.5 kg/m2 Normal blood pressure screening ( < 150/90 ) Nonsmoker Nonvegetarian 'Normal low ' chocolate consumer ( < 2 potion per week ) 'Normal low ' coffee/ tea drinker ( < 3 cup per day ) Regular exercise routine Signed consent form Haemoglobin ( anaemia marker ) < 125 g/l Gamma GT ( liver enzymes ) > 80 IU/l Cholesterol > 6.5 mmol/l Suffered myocardial infarction stroke last 12 month Suffers cardiovascular metabolic disorder ( e.g . diabetes endocrine liver disease ) Suffers bloodclotting disorder , and/or take support medication Any dietary restriction weight reduce diet On lipidmodifying blood pressure lower medication Consuming specific vitamin/ herbal supplement fish oil
